data.title: Saas Talent
data.text:
Work History:

Job Title : Staff Platform System Admin

Company name : BMC Software

Period : March 2015 - Present

Job Title : Associate Consultant

Company name : Vyom Labs

Period : November 2013 - March 2015

Summary : o Management Representative for ISO related activities

o Responsible for ISO 20000 SMS development, implementation and maintenance

o Conduct ITSM Tool Assessment

o Perform Process Gap Analysis

o Project Management Life Cycle

o Conducting ITIL, ISO 2000, Prince2 training

o Strategy management and implementation

Location : Pune Area, India

Job Title : Specialist Tech Support

Company name : Mphasis

Period : August 2012 - September 2013

Summary : Technical

o Oracle BI (Business Insight) work order processing

o Access Management Administration

o Marimba Deployment and troubleshooting

o McAfee Endpoint Encryption administration and troubleshooting

o Blackberry Enterprise Server administration (Version 7,10)

o Juniper VPN installation and troubleshooting

o FTP administration and troubleshooting

o Webex administration and troubleshooting (WebACD Access)

o Active Dictionary administration and modifications

o Mailbox administration and modifications (MS Exchange 2013)

o Distribution List administration and modifications (MS Exchange 2013)

o Windows 7,8 and Mac OSx (Yosemite) troubleshooting

o Good Knowledge of MS Project 2013, Visio 2013

Operational

o Provide suggestions for process improvements in Service Desk function

o Provide advice and guidance to customer

o Monitoring Service Health of BMC IT

o Managing shift responsibility

o Ensure that support processes are followed and adhered to

o Emergency Alternate procedure for IT Service Continuity

o Managing Major incident using Major Processes Procedure

o Handling VIP user’s ticket

o Log and track all service call using remedy

o Escalate or forward issues to second level support teams

o Document new knowledge in Knowledge Management System

o Ensure proper handoff after end of the shift

o Handling escalation from user’s end

o Providing assistance to BMC support team

o Ticket Assignment procedure

o Monitoring service level norms

o Achieving higher CSAT

Location : Pune Area, India

Job Title : Technical Support Engineer (Team Leader)

Company name : OpenView Technologies Pvt Ltd

Period : April 2010 - July 2012

Summary : Technical

o Installation of Windows XP/Vista/7/Server 2003/Server 2008.

o Troubleshooting of Windows OS.

o Maintaining different server policies Like Power management, Hibernation Policies.

o Deploying various end user applications through central application deployment server.

o Domain ID Creation and Deletion.

o Providing NAS Folder access, Quota management for NAS folder, Backup/Restoration of NAS folder.

o DNS entry on Local and external DNS

o Enforcing Group Policies.

Operational

o Tracking and monitoring of calls till closure.

o User communication and service notification.

o Monitoring of critical network, server and WAN infrastructure.

o Monitoring service level norms.

o Achieving higher CSAT.

o Redirect problems and incident to appropriate Domain Teams.

o Documentation

o Team Management

o Maintain knowledge Management system

Provided the technical support to end user of TechMahindra Ltd (Client).

Location : Pune
